title: DS 22INCH Aluminum Alloy Desk Moon Light, Color Changing Ambient Lighting with Music Sync Modes, APP Control RGBIC Desk Moon Lighting for Badroom, Living Room, Halloween or Christmas Gift (Z Series)
features: 【Immersive Ambient Lighting】: The Smart Light Bars unlock a new home theater entertainment experience that easily with your PC、TV and Laptop with 16 million colors, 27 preset scenes, and multi-modes to enhance your movie and game experience, or turn your room into a living visualizer for your music

【Multiple Ways to Connect and Control】: Bluetooth connection via APP control, remote control board control, or connection to the motherboard via 5V 3PIN Compatible with ASUS AURA, MSI mystic light etc..
【Easy to Installation】: Two 20-inch tower lights connected to the controller, and the 5FT cable is suitable for most scenarios. Iron treatment, to create a classic high-end effect
【Stylish Design】: The base and body are hand-painted ,28 customizable LEDs each of tower lighting，which is more clever and fashionable, perfect for decorating your room
【Risk-free Purchase】: If you have any questions, please contact us immediately, DS LEDdess will reply within 24 hours
description: DS Rainbow Smart Lighting Tower Starter Kit

2 x Black Lighting Tower  2 x Black Tripod  1 x Black Control Box 1 x RF Remote Controller
